headers.subject: [tosdr:2452] You're liable of someone else uses your Apple ID

html:
You may be held liable for losses incurred by Apple or any other user of or visitor to the Site due to someone else using your Apple ID, password or account as a result of your failing to keep your account information secure and confidential.

https://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/terms/site.html

Title: You may be held liable for losses if someone else uses your Apple ID

Topic: governance

Summary: You might be held liable for any losses incurred by Apple or any other user of the site if someone else uses your Apple ID. This is also true if someone uses your password or account because you didn't keep your account information confidential.

Score: 35 (mediocre)

--
